snippet: The Senate has approved a similar measure, but the lopsided votes concealed deep disagreements over the details of the legislation.
abstract: House of Representatives overwhelmingly passes a bill to ban insider trading by members of Congress and impose new ethics requirements on lawmakers and federal agency officials; Senate has approved a similar bill; lopsided vote conceals deep disagreements over details of the legislation, which now goes back to the Senate.
lead_paragraph: The Senate has approved a similar measure, but the lopsided votes concealed deep disagreements over the details of the legislation.

headline.seo: House Passes Bill Banning Insider Trading by Members of Congress
headline.main: House Passes Bill Banning Insider Trading by Members of Congress
headline.print_headline: House Passes Bill Banning Insider Trades By Officials
